TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of leukemia. It belongs to the family of drugs called protein kinase inhibitors. Also called midostaurin and N-benzoyl-staurosporine.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento de la leucemia. Es un tipo de inhibidor de la proteína cinasa. También se llama midostaurin y N-benzoilo-estaurosporina.
